Tunable.name: CHEF_COMPLIMENT_LOOT
Tunable.description: The loot action to trigger when a customer compliments a chef. This won't happen until the waitstaff deliver the compliment. The customer Sim will be the Actor and the Chef will be TargetSim.

Tunable.name: CHEF_HAS_ORDER_BUFF
Tunable.description: The buff a chef should get when they have an order. This should drive them to do the active cooking animations.

Tunable.name: CHEF_INSULT_LOOT
Tunable.description: The loot action to trigger when a customer insults a chef. This won't happen until the waitstaff deliver the insult. The customer Sim will be the Actor and the Chef will be TargetSim.

Tunable.name: CHEF_STATION_CUTTING_BOARD_OBJECT
Tunable.description: The cutting board object to create at the chef's station.

Tunable.name: CHEF_STATION_CUTTING_BOARD_SLOT
Tunable.description: The name of the slot in which the cutting board object should be placed.

Tunable.name: CHEF_STATION_PAN_OBJECT
Tunable.description: The pan object to create at the chef's station.

Tunable.name: CHEF_STATION_PAN_SLOT
Tunable.description: The name of the slot in which the pan object should be placed.

Tunable.name: CHEF_STATION_POT_OBJECT
Tunable.description: The pot object to create at the chef's station.

Tunable.name: CHEF_STATION_POT_SLOT
Tunable.description: The name of the slot in which the pot object should be placed.

Tunable.name: CHEF_STATION_SERVE_SLOT_TYPE
Tunable.description: The slot type of the serve slots on the chef station.

Tunable.name: CHEF_STATION_SERVING_PLATTER_OBJECT
Tunable.description: The serving platter object the chef will create and place when they're done cooking an order.

Tunable.name: PICK_UP_ORDER_INTERACTION
Tunable.description: The interaction the sim will run when they pick their order up from the Chef Station. This is only used when a Sim places an order directly at the chef station.
